players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob, watch your step. I'm the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie, your move. I'm watching you."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob. He might be the mafioso."
Bob: "Charlie, you're suspected. Stay cautious. Alice and I are on the town."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob; he might know something."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob; he might be the mafioso. Stay vigilant, town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.

You: "Charlie, you're suspected. Stay cautious. Alice and I are on the town."
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Bob; he might know something."
Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Bob; he might be the mafioso. Stay vigilant, town."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
